Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.sql2o.QuirksMode
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.sql2o.Sql2o.createQuery(String)
    create queries with Connection class instead, using try-with-resource blocks try (Connection con = sql2o.open()) { return sql2o.createQuery(query).executeAndFetch(Pojo.class); }
    org.sql2o.Sql2o.createQuery(String, boolean)
    create queries with Connection class instead, using try-with-resource blocks try (Connection con = sql2o.open()) { return sql2o.createQuery(query, returnGeneratedKeys).executeAndFetch(Pojo.class); }
    org.sql2o.Sql2o.createQuery(String, String)
    create queries with Connection class instead, using try-with-resource blocks try (Connection con = sql2o.open()) { return sql2o.createQuery(query, name).executeAndFetch(Pojo.class); }
    org.sql2o.Sql2o.createQuery(String, String, boolean)
    create queries with Connection class instead, using try-with-resource blocks try (Connection con = sql2o.open()) { return sql2o.createQuery(query, name, returnGeneratedKeys).executeAndFetch(Pojo.class); }
    org.sql2o.converters.Convert.getConverter(Class)
    org.sql2o.tools.ResultSetUtils.getRSVal(ResultSet, int)
    org.sql2o.converters.Convert.registerConverter(Class, Converter)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.sql2o.Sql2o(DataSource, QuirksMode)
    org.sql2o.Sql2o(String, String, String, QuirksMode)
